about_the_game: Transform any urban space into an exhilarating aerial playground with this cutting-edge simulator dedicated to the micro drone class. Liftoff®: Micro Drones, the latest in the Liftoff® Drone Simulations series, is a love letter to the FPV community. This instalment builds upon previous successes, introducing enhanced graphics, a refined user interface, a dedicated drone and track editor, and an array of single and multiplayer game modes. Get ready for a next-level micro drone FPV experience!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to be played with an RC transmitter. Single screen setups recommended. Integrated Intel HD graphics cards not recommended. RX2SIM is not supported.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to be played with an RC transmitter. Single screen setups recommended. Integrated Intel HD graphics cards not recommended. RX2SIM is not supported.
